resources.string: This sample illustrates how links can be added to a TextView. \nThis can be done either automatically by setting the autoLink property or explicitly.

text_auto_linkify: Various kinds of data that will be auto-linked. In this text are some things that are actionable. For instance, you can click on http://www.google.com and it will launch the web browser. You can click on google.com too. If you foobar@example.com for an e-mail link.
